title: COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky, Large Drying Space with 6.48ft², 600W Dehydrated Dryer, 6 Stainless Steel Trays, 48H Timer, 165°F Temperature Control, for Herbs, Meat, Fruit, and Yogurt, Silver
descriptions:
Meet the COSORI Food Dehydrator for Jerky — an easy, safe way to make healthy snacks at home.

Why you’ll like it
- Simple to use: Just set the time and temperature on the clear touch buttons. The bright LED screen is easy to read.
- Quiet: Runs softly (quieter than a normal conversation), so it won’t disturb you.
- Safe: It turns itself off when time is up and has overheat protection.
- Easy to clean: The 6 stainless steel trays are dishwasher safe.
- See your food: A clear glass door lets you check progress without opening it.
- Reliable results: A rear fan moves warm air evenly, so your food dries the same on every tray.

What it does
- Makes jerky, dried fruit, apple chips, banana chips, veggie crisps, herbs, and pet treats.
- Helps food last longer, so you waste less.
- Gives you control over ingredients—no extra salt or sugar unless you want it.

Helpful features
- Large space: 6 stainless steel trays (each about 12 x 13 inches) for plenty of food.
- Adjustable heat: 95°–165°F to match different foods.
- Long timer: Set from 30 minutes up to 48 hours. It remembers your last settings.
- Accessories included: 1 mesh screen for small items (like herbs) and 1 fruit roll sheet for fruit leathers.
- Recipe book: 50 easy recipes to get you started.

Good to know
- Power: 600W. Standard 120V, 60Hz outlet (USA and Canada).
- Designed in California.
- Quiet operation: under 48 dB.

Easy steps
1) Slice food evenly.  
2) Place on trays.  
3) Choose temperature and time.  
4) Press start and relax. The unit will shut off when finished.

If you want a simple, quiet, and safe way to make tasty, long‑lasting snacks at home, the COSORI Food Dehydrator is a dependable choice.
